column2: The faction changed the ventilation status in the territory of %s location %s
, there is a ventilation control panel
The presence of a lethal level of biological hazard
You can turn the ventilation on and off. The cost is %s CR. Keep in mind that hazardous air can affect not only this area but also neighboring ones. Be prepared for unpredictable changes!
You cannot turn the ventilation on or off. Be aware that hazardous air can affect not only this area but also others. Be careful!
